thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-AT&T Co Entered Letter Amendment To $10 Bln Term Loan Credit Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-AT&T Co Entered Letter Amendment To $10 Bln Term Loan Credit Agreement

organizations.name: bln term loan credit agreement feb

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - At&T Inc:
* AT&T INC - ‍ ON FEB 2, CO ENTERED LETTER AMENDMENT TO $10 BILLION TERM LOAN CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED AS OF NOV 15, 2016 - SEC FILING​
* AT&T INC - PURSUANT TO TERM LOAN AMENDMENT, TRANCHE A COMMITMENT WAS INCREASED FROM $5 BILLION TO $8.09 BILLION
* AT&T INC - ‍ PURSUANT TO TERM LOAN AMENDMENT, TRANCHE B COMMITMENT WAS INCREASED FROM $5 BILLION TO $8.09 BILLION
* AT&T INC - PURSUANT TO TERM LOAN AMENDMENT, COMMITMENT TERMINATION DATE WAS EXTENDED TO DEC 31, 2018 Source text : ( bit.ly/2BXonoT ) Further company coverage:
